entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
